role.argrole: thing arg0 lures arg1 into doing

example.parse: (IP (PP-ADV (P 除了) (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (NN 商业) (NN 社会)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 强大))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 广告) (CC 与) (NN 推销) (NN 手法))) (VP (PU 「) (VV 诱惑) (PU 」) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (NN 男人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 踏入) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 美丽)) (NP (NN 陷阱)))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 许多)) (NP (NN 人))) (VP (VRD (VV 观察) (VV 到)) (PU ，) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (IP-APP (NP-SBJ (NN 男士)) (VP (VV 爱美))) (NP (NN 风气))) (DEG 的)) (ADJP (JJ 重要)) (NP (NN 推手))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 常)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (PP (P 与) (NP (PN 自己))) (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 亲密)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 女人))))))))
